resources.string:
Welcome to the exciting game "Elements"! In this game, you must choose wisely between water, fire and ice to face your opponent. But beware, each element has its weakness and strength. 

Water will extinguish fire, fire will melt ice and ice will freeze water - it's a duel of gods! 
You will have only 15 seconds to make your decision, so think fast. If you fail to choose in time, the choice will be random. But don't give up if you're tied, the battle will continue until there's a clear winner or loser! 

Get ready to feel the thrill of the elements on your skin! Will you be the one chosen to master the three elements and win the game? Come on, don't be left behind!

Welcome to "Penalties" an exciting experience that will allow you to test your skills as a player and goalkeeper. 

In this game, you will take turns shooting and saving penalties in each round. You will have five shooting direction options: center, left, top left, right, and top right. Your goal will be to score more goals than your opponent to win the game. 

If after 10 rounds there is no winner, the game will go into a sudden death round, where the first player to score a goal will win. Each round has a 15 second timer so you can select your move, but if you don't, the game will select an option for you automatically.

Do you dare to test your skills and become the champion of the penalty shootout? Start playing right now and enjoy the thrill of soccer!
Are you sure you want to remove this friend?
Are you sure you want to accept this friend request?
Are you sure you want to add this friend?

Welcome to "Question Quiz", the thrilling mini-game where you'll put your knowledge to the test! Are you ready for the ultimate challenge? 

You'll have to answer between 5 and 10 random trivia questions from various categories, with 4 possible answers but only one correct. But beware, you only have 30 seconds to select your answer! If time runs out, you'll lose a life. 

But don't worry, you'll have a few lives to spare. If you manage to answer all the questions correctly without losing all your lives, you win! And when playing online, the fastest player will come out on top! Keep an eye on the top left corner of your screen to see which question you're on and how many you have left to answer. 

So, are you ready to take on the challenge and show off your knowledge? Let's play Question Quiz!
What is the largest continent in the world by area?
What is the smallest country in the world?
What is the highest mountain in the world?
What is the largest country in South America?
What is the capital of Egypt?
What is the currency of Brazil?
What is the capital of Australia?
Which city is the capital of Japan?
Which river is the longest in the world?
Which famous physicist developed the theory of relativity?
What is the largest organ in the human body?
What is the chemical symbol for gold?
Which famous artist painted the Mona Lisa?
Who painted the famous work \'Starry Night\'?
Who wrote the novel \'To Kill a Mockingbird\'?
Who wrote the play \'Romeo and Juliet\'?
Which one is not a programming language?
Which planet in our solar system is the largest?
What is the smallest planet in our solar system?
Share your decision with your friends posting a photo
Sorry, only the winner can publish the decision you have made. \n\nPerhaps next time you\'ll win.
You lost against the robot, can you share its decision by posting a photo
